title: Looking for connected script similar to Marc Newson signature
content: I am guessing this is a digitally modified design of marc newson's signature, but I am searching for something similar in a commercially available font. ![marc](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415023654im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/70066.gif)
author: designalchemy

comments.content:
My Starlight Motel has some similar forms but isn't monoline -   
   
 [http://www.fontdiner.com/menu\_ifm.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415023654/http:/www.fontdiner.com/menu_ifm.html)   
   
Stuart :D

[Part 9 of the Script Font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415023654/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script09Pg1.html) has some vertical monoline (mostly) handwriting scripts that may be similar enough:   
   
Notec (Linotype) p.1   
Garrido (Unifonts) p.1   
Emmascript MVB (Adobe) p.1   
Lanier (E-phemera) p.5   
Sincerely (Canada Type) p.7 (same as Elegance p.1, but more easily found)   
   
You can probably test drive all but Unifonts Garrido at MyFonts.com

Oooh, don't hold yer breath, Ole. It's not very likely we're gonna   
find something similar. ![:-(](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415023654im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/sad.gif)
